tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solo_travel_packing_list (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  category VARCHAR(100),
  packed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    destination VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE checklist (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    is_checked BOOLEAN,
    packing_list_id INT REFERENCES packing_lists(id)
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_name VARCHAR(50),
    destination VARCHAR(100),
    expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expense_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_destinations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  trip_duration INT
);
